entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
WINDY WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH, INCREASING TO 20 TO 30 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY
SHOWERS LIKELY
WINDY WITH LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR AND BREEZY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
